item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hyojun Jung

Ph.D. Student in Hospitality & Tourism Management

I explore how data and behavioral theories inform tourism strategy. I am especially passionate about quantitative research, strategic decision-making, and AI’s role in service industries. Based in Virginia, open to global collaboration.

📧 Email
hyojunjung@vt.edu

💼 LinkedIn
linkedin.com/in/hyojunjung

Skills

  • 💡 Analytical thinking & behavioral insights
  • 💡 Quantitative modeling & econometrics
  • 💡 Interdisciplinary problem-solving

Technologies

  • ⚙️ Python, R, SQL, Stata, SPSS, AMOS
  • ⚙️ Data visualization: ggplot2, seaborn, plotly
  • ⚙️ Markdown, Git, Hugo, Typora
  • ⚙️ Microsoft Office Suite

Languages

  • 🇰🇷 Korean (Native)
  • 🇺🇸 English (Fluent)
  • 🇮🇩 Indonesian (Intermediate)

Work Experience

🎓 Graduate Research & Teaching Assistant

Virginia Tech | 2023 – Present
